textDari: هر که باد بکارد, طوفان درو می‌کند..
textPashto: څوک چې باد کري، توپان رېبي
translationEn: He who sows the wind reaps the storm.
meaning: Bad actions lead to worse consequences.
One small change isn't enough to make a big difference.

translationEn: A foolish person is his own enemy.
meaning: Lack of wisdom leads to self-destruction.

textDari: دوست آن باشد که گیرد دست دوست
textPashto: دوست هغه دی چې د دوست لاس ونیسي
translationEn: A true friend is one who lends a hand.
meaning: A real friend supports you in difficult times.
